title: Dream Global REIT to be bought by Blackstone funds in $4.7 billion deal
text:
Dream Global REIT to be bought by Blackstone funds in $4.7 billion deal

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 15, 2019 09:11PM ET)

(Reuters) - Dream Global Real Estate Investment Trust (TO: ) said on Sunday it is to be bought by funds managed by Blackstone Group Inc (N: ) in a C$6.2 billion ($4.69 billion) deal. Blackstone will pay C$16.79 in cash for each Dream Global unit to acquire all of the office and industrial property manager's subsidiaries and assets, according to a statement from Dream Global.
